name: channel_channels
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool youtube.
Tool description: With the YouTube Data API, you can add various YouTube features to your app. Use the API for search, videos, playlists, channels and more.
API description: Fetches data from the YouTube channel's collections or subscriptions using the RapidAPI service.

cursor.description: Pagination token for results. Default is None.

gl.description: Geolocation code to filter the results by region. Default is 'US'.

is_id.description: Channel ID to query. Default is 'UC-lHJZR3Gqxm24_Vd_AJ5Yw'.

filter.description:
Filter key or token, default: `all_collections`

Keys you can enter:

- `all_collections`: Returns channel collections
- `subscriptions`: Returns subscribed channels
- or custom collection token

hl.description: Language code for the results. Default is 'en'.
